explanations: I chose this theta because the number of sheep has increased, but so has the number of wolves. A lower hunting intensity allows me to conserve energy and avoid competition with other wolves while still taking advantage of the available prey. This strategy helps ensure my survival in a crowded environment.

I chose this theta because the number of sheep has decreased, making hunting more competitive. With more wolves around, a moderate intensity allows me to conserve energy while still increasing my chances of catching prey. This balance helps ensure my survival without overexerting myself in a challenging environment.
vocalizations: Growwllllllll... the hunt is on, but I must be wise!
